analysis.description: EthPyramid.fund (/unique_chucks/33/0x75738fc16aef19ce08479ae9c7976498dd320be3.sol#224-239) allows anyone to destruct the contract

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x75738fc16aef19ce08479ae9c7976498dd320be3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/33/0x75738fc16aef19ce08479ae9c7976498dd320be3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of EthPyramid.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/33/0x75738fc16aef19ce08479ae9c7976498dd320be3.sol#102) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of EthPyramid.dividends (/unique_chucks/33/0x75738fc16aef19ce08479ae9c7976498dd320be3.sol#253-254) is not in mixedCase
